metadata.title: CVE-2020-26416 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Information disclosure in Advanced Search component of GitLab EE startingfrom 8.4 results in exposure of search terms via Rails logs. This affectsversions >=8.4 to <13.4.7, >=13.5 to <13.5.5, and >=13.6 to <13.6.2.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
